title: Product Name
description: The name of the product being built. Defaults to the name of the workspace.

title: Package
description: The package to build. Defaults to the root workspace directory.

title: Playdate SDK Path
description: The path to the Playdate SDK. Defaults to the standard location.

title: Target
description: The target selected for building the project.

title: Extra Device .o Build Directories
description: Additional paths to search for .o files when building for the device.
